sentences.english: Cats and lions show generic differences.
sentences.chinese: 猫与狮显示出类属的差别。

sentences.english: This plush pub-dog is a new product.
sentences.chinese: 这只长毛绒狮淘宝如何取消订单子狗是新产品。

sentences.english: Both mothers were lying on their backs with their paws in the air.
sentences.chinese: 两个母狮都仰面而卧挥舞着狮爪。

sentences.english: We go out to see a lion and and set off some fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去看看舞龙狮和放鞭炮。

sentences.english: Lion Peak Mountain Longjing Longjing tea in the top grade.
sentences.chinese: 狮峰山上的龙井为龙井茶中之上品。

sentences.english: This paper mainly studied the sluice pier of HeMianShi hydroelectric station.
sentences.chinese: 本文是以合面狮水电站大坝的溢流坝闸墩为研究对象。

sentences.english: An army of sheep led by a lion would defeat an army of lions led by a sheep.
sentences.chinese: 雄师率领的一群羊可以打败绵羊带领的一伙狮。

sentences.english: I was in Beijing Zoo in Beijing in Febrary, 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年2月，我在北京动物园狮虎山前留影。

sentences.english: Ataturk Mausoleum, Ankara, Road With Lion.
sentences.chinese: 图尔克陵墓，安卡拉，道路与狮。

sentences.english: Stilt-walking, drumming and dragon and lion dancing are the main entertainment forms of the Lantern Festival.
sentences.chinese: 踩高跷，敲大鼓和舞龙狮也是元宵节主要的娱乐活动。

sentences.english: They set off firecrackers and watch fireworks displays.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去看看舞龙狮和放鞭炮。

sentences.english: An Asiatic lion dozes in the sun at the Zurich Zoo in Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士苏黎世动物园，一只亚洲狮正在阳光下午休。

sentences.english: The argument that the lion totemism exists in Dai minority area is worth discussing.
sentences.chinese: 傣族地区存在狮图腾崇拜的说法是值得商榷的。

definition: Leo (star sign)/Shihtzu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
White Tiger (the seven mansions of the west sky)/(slang) hairless female genitalia
wild beast/wild horse/lion/trad. form used erroneously for 貌/simplified form used erroneously for 狻
celestial horse (mythology)/fine horse/Ferghana horse/(western mythology) Pegasus
